SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.app

Class Config

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.app.Config
public class Config extends Object
The Config class manages the configuration for puzzles by loading configuration data from an XML file. It provides methods to access puzzle class names, display names, and their file creation statuses

  • Method Details

    • getPuzzleClassNames

      public List<String> getPuzzleClassNames()
      Gets a list of all available Puzzle names
      Returns:
      Vector of Puzzle names which are Strings

    • getFileCreationEnabledPuzzles

      public List<String> getFileCreationEnabledPuzzles()
      Returns a list of the names of the puzzles which can have puzzles created and edited within the proof editor.
      Returns:
      the aforementioned list of Strings

    • convertClassNameToDisplayName

      public static String convertClassNameToDisplayName(String className)
      Converts the class name of the puzzles to their display names. Some examples of the conversion: convertClassNameToDisplayName("TreeTent") will return "Tree Tent" convertClassNameToDisplayName("Nurikabe") will return "Nurikabe"
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class
      Returns:
      displayName the name of the puzzle

    • convertDisplayNameToClassName

      public static String convertDisplayNameToClassName(String displayName)
      Converts the display name of the puzzle back to its corresponding class name. For example: convertDisplayNameToClassName("Tree Tent") returns "TreeTent"
      Parameters:
      displayName - the display name of the puzzle
      Returns:
      the class name of the puzzle as a String

    • getPuzzleNames

      public List<String> getPuzzleNames()
      Gets a list of all available puzzle display names
      Returns:
      a List of puzzle display names as Strings

    • getFileCreationEnabledPuzzleNames

      public List<String> getFileCreationEnabledPuzzleNames()
      Returns a list of the display names of the puzzles that can have files created and edited within the proof editor
      Returns:
      a List of puzzle display names as Strings with file creation enabled

    • getPuzzleClassForName

      public String getPuzzleClassForName(String puzzleName)
      Gets a Puzzle class for a puzzle name
      Parameters:
      puzzleName - puzzle name of the class
      Returns:
      class name for the puzzle name
